help.short: Create operation to create or update a gallery image. Please note some properties can be set only during gallery image creation.
Delete operation to delete a gallery image.
List all of the gallery images in the specified subscription. Use the nextLink property in the response to get the next page of gallery images.
Get a gallery image
Update operation to update a gallery image.
Manage Gallery Image
